CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Final Design Approval stage positioned above or below the Production stage?
SRP.A: The Final Design Approval stage is positioned {above} the Production stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Testing and Validation?
VE.A: The value of stage Testing and Validation is {51%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Production?
VE.A: The value of stage Production is {22%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Project Initiation, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Production, with a value of {22%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval is {16%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 76%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Project Initiation} stage has {100%}, the {Design Phase} stage has {84%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 28%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 28% and 76%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prototype Development} stage has {68%}, the {Testing and Validation} stage has {51%}, the {Final Design Approval} stage has {35%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation, or from stage Project Initiation to Design Phase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prototype Development} to {Testing and Validation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Project Initiation to Design Phase, from stage Design Phase to Prototype Development, or from stage Final Design Approval to Production?
NC.A: The reductions from stage {Project Initiation} to {Design Phase}, {Design Phase} to {Prototype Development}, and {Final Design Approval} to {Production} are equal.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Prototype Development} and {Testing and Validation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Final Design Approval} and {Production} stages.
